This extension is for the average school kid made by a highschool kid who understands your pain!
features:
 - random number generator
 - inspirational quote to prevent you dying from depression
 - annoying noises:
     - airhorn
     - yee sound

if you have any suggestions please contact mroscarfinley@gmail.com and check out the website at https://sites.google.com/view/the-usefulness-extension/home
